content.text: Match ends, Manchester United 3, Liverpool 1.
Second Half ends, Manchester United 3, Liverpool 1.
Foul by Luke Shaw (Manchester United).
Jordon Ibe (Liverpool) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Goal!  Manchester United 3, Liverpool 1. Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Shinji Kagawa.
Attempt blocked. Emre Can (Liverpool) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Wayne Rooney (Manchester United) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Raheem Sterling (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
